snippet: Viewership declined 31.2 percent on the YES Network as the Yankees struggled and failed to make the postseason.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that viewership declined 31.2 percent on the YES Network as the New York Yankees struggled and failed to make the postseason; contends that drop off suggests deep dissatisfaction with team that played most of season without many of its stars.
lead_paragraph: Viewership declined 31.2 percent on the YES Network as the Yankees struggled and failed to make the postseason.
